summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3341, for the improvement of the alley in block 8, Denny-Fuhrman Addition, being the alley between Harvard Avenue North and North Broadway from Roanoke Street to Edgar Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41237 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
